html:
Amazon Seller Services Private Limited, an India-based company engaged in providing telephone voice and data communications services, wholesale activities. has secured INR 14600 Million (USD196 million) in venture funding from Amazon Corporate Holdings Pvt. Ltd and Amazon.com Inc Ltd.

Deal In Brief

Deal Value (US$ Million)196.22
Deal TypeVenture Finance
Sub-CategoryLater Stage
Deal StatusCompleted: 2021-11-14

Deal Participants

Target (Company)Amazon Seller Services Pvt Ltd
Acquirer 1 (Company)Amazon Corporate Holdings Pvt Ltd
Acquirer 2 (Company)Amazon.com .incs Ltd
